pages.title: About
pages.description: self-portrait or short autobiography created by a business

content_blocks.hero_title: Our  team is brimming with talent, and we're ready to make a difference for you!

items.title: Team Members
items.description_html: Our energetic team goes above and beyond to offer the best products for all our clients.

items.title: Brand & Clients
items.description_html: Every project give us new opportunities for development. We're always flexible, and ready to adapt.

items.title: Impacted Projects
items.description_html: We're making an impact every day — it's our mission to help all our clients meet their goals.

items.title: Web development
items.description_html:
Build fast & scalable web applications using React & NodeJS.

Microservices & DevOps Ready.

items.title: Mobile development
items.description_html:
Deploy your Android & iOS Apps.

We create stunning & optimized apps with a range of frameworks.

items.title: Digital product design
items.description_html: Visualize your ideas by prototyping a minimum viable product and validating your market quickly.

items.title: Cloud & DevOps
items.description_html: Deploy your system using optimized, scalable & secure cloud platforms like Amazon AWS.

content_blocks.description_html: To be the company our customers want us to be, it takes an eclectic and talented group who are passionate about the customer experience. Get to know the people leading the way at Dante.
Discover our multidisciplinary expertise as we share our journey of developing digital products.

pages.title: Home
pages.description: A customisable template built with Jekyll and Bootstrap.

content_blocks.description_html: We're here to help you grow your digital services — from mobile development to websites, digital signage to desktop applications, we do it all.

items.title: Perfect strategies
items.description_html: With in-depth research and analysis, we introduce revolutionary solutions.

items.title: Innovative ideas
items.description_html: We build electrifying relationships between people and products.

items.title: Effective solutions
items.description_html: No matter the problem, we'll help you solve it, and delight your users every time.

items.title: Set up call tracking
items.description_html: Assign unique identifiers to each campaign and/or traffic source.

items.title: Analyze the data
items.description_html: With rich reports you can see your most effective marketing campaigns.

items.title: Grow your business
items.description_html: Improve your marketing, win more customers, and retain more clients.

content_blocks.content_html: “I’ve used a few similar services in the past to increase my marketing capacity and Dante was by far the best experience I’ve had. From initial discussions, to their research and analysis, I was able to 10x my reach and focus on the campaigns that actually worked. I highly recommend Dante to anyone looking for a digital services team.”

content_blocks.heading: Discuss your project & business goals with us!
content_blocks.lower_text_html: We'll customize a business plan just for you.
